org.wildfly.swarm

Class Swarm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.swarm.container.Container
      • org.wildfly.swarm.Swarm

  • public class Swarm
extends Container
    Default main(...) if an application does not provide one.

    This simply constructs a default container, starts it and performs a default deployment. Typically only useful for barren WAR applications.

    Author:
    Bob McWhirter
